title: Infernal Rapier
content:
Flame-chewed and narrow, this blade is Wyll's soul summarised in steel.

Infernal Rapier is one of the Rapier Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Infernal Rapier is a powerful weapon for caster characters that adds their spellcasting proficiency instead of dexterity to its attacks, it also allows you to summon a Cambion as if you were casting Planar Ally.
